roleset.name: make unhappy
roleset.note: DISSATISFY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'dissatisfy' based on wsj; nominal 'dissatisfaction' based on BOLT-7. Member of VNcls amuse-31.1. (from dissatisfy.01-v)
DISSATISFACTION-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from dissatisfaction.01-n)

example.name: dissatisfy-v
example.text: If parents-1 are dissatisfied [*-1] with a school, they should have the option of switching to another.

example.name: dissatisfy-v: dissatisfy by
example.text: His grip on power unraveled this summer as [thousands of his countrymen]-1, dissatisfied [*]-1 by the harshness of his rule, fled to the West.
example.arg: by the harshness of his rule

example.name: dissatisfaction-n
example.text: Once government regulation turns into simply government bureaucratic behavior , low efficiency will occur . Not only will it not be able to continue , it will also lead to the dissatisfaction of the residents .
